backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister managing user profiles, vehicles, notifications, activation tokens, and access control with admin/user permission helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA-related features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hooks rules with custom warnings and ignore patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting configuration defining code style rules like quotes, width, and trailing commas.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Policy defining stable interfaces, backend contracts, and mandatory review and verification steps for changes.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting PWA additions, route features, and release history.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script that runs frontend quality gates via npm.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up metadata, PWA icons, and loads the main React script.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist ensuring compliance with change-control rules, testing, and documentation updates.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and behavior for installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching rules with network-first for HTML and cache-first for static assets.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing the quality gates system and how to run automated checks.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how developers should follow the change-control system during feature work.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation describing semantic versioning rules for the project.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Placeholder test file with no content.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app, routes, query client, and initializes service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card to show activation status and redeem vehicle registration activation tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen for failed profile loading with backend diagnostics and copyable error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders the Internet Identity sign‑in screen with branding, feature highlights, and a login button tied to the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Displays detailed startup bootstrap errors with retry logic, backend health checks, and clipboard copy for diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Shows the app logo image in configurable sizes for branding use across the UI.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file for a future language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with optional header, routed content area, and footer including version info.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Modal dialog allowing users to report a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with notes and validation.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Modal dialog for submitting a found‑vehicle report with required description text.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation header with logo, navigation buttons, user menu, admin visibility logic, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches top‑level render errors and displays a fallback UI instead of crashing.
Fallback screen for unrecoverable app errors with reload guidance and troubleshooting tips.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: UI panel that initiates a vehicle transfer by verifying a PIN and generating a transfer code with copyable link.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Dialog prompting the user for a PIN with validation and error handling before submitting.
frontend/src/components/vehicle/VehicleP: Displays a vehicle photo and shows a fallback message if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors and manages bounded and continuous retry logic with timers.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations such as checking admin status and generating invite or activation codes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend reachability and diagnostics using an anonymous actor with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles lost or found with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Retrieves user notifications and allows marking a notification as read with auto-refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Provides a mutation hook to complete onboarding via actor calls with detailed logging and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Contains hooks for checking, setting, and updating a user PIN through actor methods and invalidates PIN-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile using actor methods with query control and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Implements hooks to initiate and accept vehicle transfers, updating related vehicle queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Provides a mutation hook that checks vehicle status by engine number via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Supplies hooks to check activation for vehicle registration and redeem activation tokens, handling errors and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Offers hooks to fetch, register, revoke, and retrieve specific vehicles through actor calls with query invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n configuration logic.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the i18n provider implementation.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Empty language file intended for Arabic translations.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Empty language file intended for English translations.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Empty language file intended for Indonesian translations.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty language file intended for Simplified Chinese translations.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n storage or persistence utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Empty test file placeholder for VehiclesPage fetch flow tests.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an informational About page describing the application, features, and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Implements the UI and logic for accepting a vehicle transfer using a transfer code.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system stats, access checks, and error handling for admin verification and stats loading.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface for generating activation tokens for users with validation, copy helpers, and access checks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics for vehicles, notifications, and reported statuses with quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Lists lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with search filtering and status details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user notifications and allows marking them as read.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles onboarding form submission and first-admin setup logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to edit their profile, manage PINs, and view activation status.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a vehicle with photo upload and activation checks.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundVehiclePag: Provides a form to search a vehicle by engine number and, if marked Lost/Stolen/Pawned, allows submitting a found report.
frontend/src/pages/RevokeOwnershipPage.t: Displays the user's active vehicles and handles revoking ownership with PIN confirmation and navigation feedback.
Handles PIN creation and updates for securing ownership transfer actions with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Lets users check a vehicle’s status by engine number, showing badges, alerts, photos, and found‑report options based on status.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed vehicle info, status badges, transfer options, and lets the owner revoke ownership with PIN verification.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Displays the user's vehicles, activation status, and registration options, with conditional UI based on fetch states and vehicle status badges.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker in production, handles update detection, and logs registration results or errors.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate tests.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Controls app bootstrapping, authentication flow, profile loading, and actor initialization with multiple error and retry states.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Wraps backend actor to safely handle admin initialization, suppress invalid token failures, and avoid startup traps.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a consistent React Query key for actor-related queries based on principal identity.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides allowlist checks and retrieval for admin principals to support role-based access control bypass.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Provides helpers to detect canister-stopped errors, extract error text, and classify bootstrap errors with appropriate guidance messages.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor call errors into user-friendly messages with categorized error types while preserving raw error data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app’s version and build timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and design tokens for the frontend.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, PWA requirements, current issues, and existing feature definitions.
